item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "I know you love me. The question is, how much?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Elizabeth Berg
item.description: "You are born into your family and your family is born into you. No returns. No exchanges." -- Elizabeth Berg

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "If you gave someone your heart and they died, did they take it with them? Did you spend the rest of forever with a hole inside you that couldn't be filled?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Maybe who we are isn't so much about what we do, but rather what we're capable of when we least expect it." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "When you love someone you let them take care of you." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "If you have a sister and she dies, do you stop saying you have one? Or are you always a sister, even when the other half of the equation is gone?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "In nineteen minutes, you can mow the front lawn; color your hair; watch a third of a hockey game. In nineteen minutes, you can bake scones or get a tooth filled by a dentist; you can fold laundry for a family of five. In nineteen minutes, you can stop the world; or you can just jump off it." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "It takes two people to make a lie work: the person who tells it, and the one who believes it." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't need water to feel like you're drowning, do you?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Did you ever walk through a room that's packed with people, and feel so lonely you can hardly take the next step?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "The truth doesn't always set you free; people prefer to believe prettier, neatley wrapped lies" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "It's disappointing to know that someone can see right through you." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "I, um, I have this problem. I broke up with my boyfriend, you see. And I'm pretty upset about it, so I wanted to talk to my best friend. [...] The thing is, they're both you." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "I've always sort of wondered: If everyone else's opinion is what matters, then do you ever really have one of your own?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "I learn from my own daughter that you donâ€™t have to be awake to cry." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You can't exist in this world without leaving a piece of yourself behind." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Yaya add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "There is a candle in your heart, ready to be kindled. There is a void in your soul, ready to be filled. You feel it, don't you?" -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
